features: ORGANIC FACE MOISTURIZER - 100% natural face butter, an excellent alternative skin care treatment to water-based face creams and lotions. This facial moisturizer is hydrating and helps smooth & hydrate dry facial skin, tighten loose skin, shrink pores, clear up acne, prevent breakouts, reduce wrinkles, and minimize the appearance of acne scars for a radiant and glowing appearance.

INCREDIBLE SKIN CARE - this organic body butter will hydrate your skin, giving you a soft, smooth, and firm look. This body moisturizer reduces the appearance of uneven skin tone, fine lines, age spots, dark spots & ashy skin. It will also heal dry, itchy skin irritation, & minor skin discoloration. Use as an after shower moisturizer to nourish and restore moisture to your entire body.

TREAT DRY HANDS & CUTICLES - anti aging hand cream for dry, cracked hands caused by weather conditions or excessive work. This all-natural hand moisturizer works fast by naturally restoring moisture to damaged areas for soft, beautiful hands, cuticles, and nails.

ALL NATURAL HAIR MOISTURIZER - This hair butter is excellent for daily use to give wavy & curly hair a softer, longer, and richer look. Ideal for rejuvenating & thickening weak thin brittle hair. Organic hair styling formula which Nourishes and protects your hair. A superior natural alternative to chemical hair creams and lotions. Try using this 100% natural chemical-free hair moisturizer for youthful, full beautiful hair and split end treatment.

INGRIDIENTS YOU CAN TRUST - Organic anti aging moisturizer made of 100% cold-pressed oils, including Organic Extra Virgin Olive oil, Sweet Almond oil, Jojoba oil, Castor oil, Grapeseed oil, Sunflower oil, Vitamin E oil, & Lavender Essential oil. Vegan, non-GMO. It is 100% free from water, preservatives, Parabens, gluten, fillers, artificial scents, and chemicals.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Specifications Name: Ancient Greek Remedy Butter CreamCountry of Origin: Greece, Spain, Italy, FranceExtraction Method: Cold PressedIngredients: Olive Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Jojoba Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Sunflower Oil, Castor Oil, Lavender Oil, Vitamin EOil Color: GoldenAroma: Lavender

Benefits & Uses Face Moisturizer All-natural face butter suits all skin types (dry, oily, or combination). It absorbs quickly, is hypoallergenic and suitable for sensitive skin, helps balance oil production, doesn't leave a greasy residue, and won't clog pores. In addition, the lavender light scent is appealing and subtle. Body Moisturizer All natural body Butter for daily use as part of a healthy skincare routine for youthful, glowing skin. Apply to damp skin after a shower to lock in moisture for remarkable results. It soothes and replenishes dry skin moisture for a beautiful skin complexion. And most importantly, it absorbs quickly

Hair Care The perfect organic hair moisturizer for all hair types (fine, curly, or dry). Protects your hair from heat damage. It hydrates and prevents frizzy hair and your strands from losing precious moisture, keeping frizz at bay & preventing split ends & dryness for youthful hair. Hands, Cuticles & Nails Use our butter cream to moisturize dry hands, cuticles, and the surrounding skin, which helps promote healthier nail growth. By hydrating cuticles, nails get softer and are less likely to break and peel, resulting in longer and healthier-looking nails.

What makes Ancient Greek Remedy Butter Cream unique? Most moisturizers are water-based, which requires preservatives to maintain shelf life. Our formula is made out of 100% cold-pressed oils with no water, which means it is 100% preservative-free. Why should I prefer a moisturizer with no preservatives? Preservatives eradicate bacteria that might cause contamination. It will not distinguish between harmful organisms, and beneficial skin bacteria. Your skin is your biggest organ, and using moisturizers clean of preservatives will benefit your skin. Why do water-based formulas use preservatives? Many moisturizers will have water as the first ingredient, which means they are 85%-95% water. Water is easily contaminated and cannot sustain extended shelf life without preservatives. How does your formula maintain shelf life with no preservatives? Our formula is made of 100% cold-pressed oils. Bacteria will not grow in oil, which is contamination-resistant by nature. In addition, we use a state-of-the-art airless bottle, which prevents the formula from exposure to air. Why should I choose Ancient Greek Remedy Butter Cream? We make small batches with care and love using the highest quality organic cold-pressed oils. The formula is suitable for all skin types and is 100% free from water, preservatives, parabens, gluten, fillers, artificial scents, and chemicals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Dry Skin Remedy
reviews.reviewText: This is some of the best skin moisturizer I've ever used. I have very dry facial skin and the Butter Cream penetrates well enough to soften. I also love the lavender scent. I use this every morning and evening.Customer service is very efficient and accommodating. The pump on one bottle that I received was defective. They sent me a new one immediately and did not charge or ask for return of defective bottle. That's above and beyond!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Was Stunned
reviews.reviewText: I am a new found fan. This rich, creamy, miracle of a product is worth its weight in gold. I am in my early 60s, a summer sun worshiper in a harsh winter environment that has dry indoor heating. My skin is soft and silky after just one week! Personally, I love the scent it is a very natural lavender with rosemary notes. The scent lightly lingers for a brief time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality all-purpose product
reviews.reviewText: I find this to be all excellent multi-purpose, unisex moisturizer. This makes it great for people who are trying to cut down on the number of products they use, especially for travel. It's in an airtight dispenser that will easily pump out every drop to the bottom. To me the scent is suitable for any gender. I don't find it flowery feminine or too masculine. Also, a little goes quite a long way, so it will last.Face: My face tends to be on the oilier side, so personally I wouldn't use this daytime under makeup. I find it to be great at nighttime though. A very small amount is all you need. I had no trouble with it clogging pores or making my face feel like a grease pit.Hands & body: Great body moisturizer after shower, just a small amount is needed. It soaks in within a few minutes, doesn't make my clothes greasy. Excellent moisturizer for hands and cuticles overnight. In the daytime you might want to wipe your palms off a bit with a tissue.Hair: I have shoulder length hair, semi-course and very thick with a strong natural wave. This worked great for me three ways. 1. Overnight or before-shower treatment on dry ends, 2. Through damp hair before drying (very small amount, maybe the size of three straight-pin heads), 3. Lightly after drying to smooth flyaways or frizzies.This has high-quality natural ingredients that are great for the hair and skin. Being a multi-use unisex product with convenient packaging makes it ideal for travel or space-saving at home. Thumbs up, I would definitely buy this again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Feels natural but super oily
reviews.reviewText: I like how natural it feels and smells but it is a really oily lotion. A little goes a long way, I think I’ll just be using it for my feet and hands as I do oddly like how it makes my hands feel. If you’re someone who really massages your lotions or oils into your skin this is probably a good brand for you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice product and excellent customer service
reviews.reviewText: My order arrived and it was obvious that the contents leaked and soaked through the outer cardboard box. There was an email address to contact their customer service, so I emailed a picture of the leaking bottle and stained box. I received a prompt reply and very satisfactory resolution. The product is very moisturizing and has a lovely lavender scent. A little goes a long way. I will definitely buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Feel Like I Discovered a Miracle
reviews.reviewText: I am fair, blonde and freckled. And, old. Did I mention old? ( I forgot). Make that elderly. Dry skin is suddenly a thing of the past. I use this twice daily. Have never experienced anything like how smooth and soft my skin feels. Great ingredients and few. Good sign right off the bat. I think you will be happy with a mild herbal fragrance that quickly dissipates. Use as directed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not was I was hoping for...
reviews.reviewText: I REALLY wanted to give this a 5 star review... but its unfortunately not that. My initial thoughts on the scent were a natural lavender with notes of an earthy environment that instantly transported me to Greece and made me feel really calm and peaceful. The scent may initially come off as rather masculine but I'd say its balanced out by the lavender making it perfect for any and every one. About an hour later, the scent shifted to having no undernotes of earth and instead having a sweeter lavender smell making it smell almost like Grapefruit. The cream felt good at first.. but eventually felt hot as it felt as though my pores and skin were clogged by it making me itchy and look red which was especially on my face. On top of that, I've never had this happen to me but the cream made my light yet warm skin turn a shade darker which instantly washed off as I took a bath making it go back to its natural color. While taking a bath, there was weird dirt water coming off me which I've never seen before but I wouldn't be surprised if it was the cream. The cream didn't feel like other creams/lotions that I've used where its absorbed by the skin.. it felt as though it was just on it while moisturizing. It worked a lot better on my hair but I've since been hesitant to put it back on as I don't want whatever that weird dirt was to just be sitting on my hair. I think it may work better on others but for my sensitive skin and hair.. I really don't think it helps.Edit: I forgot to mention that this came inside a box with a scratch off card with a discount for future purchases. I got 30% off but I'm sure there's higher and lower ones. I thought that was really nice of them to include. I requested a refund and promptly received it as well as an unscented bottle for free which I thought was really nice of the company.Edit 2: I've recently tried using this about an hour or so before a shower as a leave in and highly recommend it be used as such. It still wasnt perfect but it personally worked much better for me like that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very rich body butter, lots of uses
reviews.reviewText: I originally purchased this butter for my face, in particular for fine lines around the mouth, but found it a bit too heavy. I was getting breakouts. However, it’s a wonderful body moisturizer for dry flaky skin on my legs and arms. I also use it to detangle one area of my long hair on the crown of my head after shampooing. Also works well as slide for facial cupping. Lots of uses.
Loved the silky feel of this moisturizer. Sinks into skin within 10 min. Love all the natural ingredients. Would recommend

Wow. I’m so impressed with these sellers. Unfortunately the product did not suit my teen daughter, but the customer service regarding the issue was just amazing. The product itself was amazing too, my daughter is just very sensitive so it’s hard to products that suit. I would highly recommend this company.

reviews.reviewTitle: Happy to have found this "organic, natural gem"
reviews.reviewText: I have tried hundreds of cosmetic products but always searching for healthier alternatives which can bring the best results for my skin and so I have found this organic product on Amazon ; since I've start using it I am so happy with the results ! I am done with countless of other products , from now on this is my go to cream for moisturizing the face and neck ; I am also using the Unscented Organic Blend of Olive, Almond, Grapeseed, Jojoba and Sunflower oil for the whole body moisturizing , and in addition , some serums from another company which manufactures organic products .
I love it but after it has been on for a little bit I take a clean cloth and wipe the excess off before I put my makeup on
Happy happy happy with this oil combination for face and especially for hair, use for the ends as a conditioner. After couple of min, cream fully absorbs, left no grease on a skin.Thank you!!!
